html:
10.10.17  10:58 pm   Will I catch you on the flip side?

     yes but also the regular side

10.10.17  10:44 pm   Can I have some information?

     sure

10.10.17  10:34 pm   So, is Victoria's secret her vagina?

     i was going to say no, but now that i think about it yes, that's exactly what it is

10.10.17  10:11 pm   If nothing is faster then light, how did the dark get there first?

     dark is nothing, which you already admitted is faster than light

10.10.17  10:07 pm   how do i change the world

     start by figuring out how it currently is

10.10.17  10:06 pm   can i blame you for things when i don't want to blame myself?

     sure but i will blame you back, for all those things plus more things you've never even heard of

10.10.17  9:58 pm   when are you gonna have a documentary about you cuz honestly i wanna know your thought process when it comes to shit.

     i might have already been doing that for a long time

10.10.17  9:54 pm   whats your favorite type of COOL STUFF

     regular stuff

10.10.17  9:45 pm   someone a long time ago described plucked string instruments as 'soapy' and you said something like "aren't you special" or something. Did you have that in mind at any point when making soap tips?

     no
10.10.17  9:42 pm   Do you make your own music?

10.10.17  9:42 pm   Have you ever had a dream?

     yes

10.10.17  9:35 pm   what is the estimated amount of people that view this website 

     billions, if not zillions

10.10.17  9:33 pm   i sometimes wonder if im an obsolete piece of technology, am i?

     not yet

10.10.17  9:32 pm   Hi bill. I have been having a problem where my soap gets to be too soft, almost like it is melting. Do you have any soap tips for resolving this situation

     find something to carry it in like maybe a backpack or fanny pack

10.10.17  9:28 pm   are you considering suicide

     no

10.10.17  9:26 pm   What is your favorite method of transportation?

     already being there

10.10.17  9:21 pm   Do you have any interest in writing music for people other than yourself 

     maybe but also not really

10.10.17  9:11 pm   If I live in NY can I help you with your videos?

     sure

10.10.17  9:10 pm   I want you to know that the plural of "beef" is "beeves". It's just too important 

     you're right, that is pretty important. thank you

10.10.17  9:09 pm   how do I know if I'm bad at Twitter or if I just haven't been discovered yet

     you get to decide

10.10.17  9:07 pm   What do you think of grass??

     seems like a cool idea

10.10.17  9:06 pm   Soap tips bore a passing resemblance to your history of videos.

     that might be because it was made by the same person

     Was this to satisfy the people who are always telling you to do more videos like hotewig?

     no

10.10.17  9:01 pm   when is the united states going to declare independence from britain

     they might have already done it

10.10.17  8:55 pm   What is the longest word you know

     flannel

10.10.17  8:22 pm   what if all straight lines were actually curvy lines?

     i think they are

10.10.17  8:18 pm   Should I adopt a Golden Retriever or a German Shepherd?

     sure

10.10.17  8:15 pm   Will your next video be about trains?

     that depends if the next song is about trains

10.10.17  8:15 pm   What do you think of the idea that a creator is cheating both their audience and themselves if they make something they already know how to make?

     not necessarily

     Do you think artists should push themselves and make something crazy they didn't know they had in them?

     sure

10.10.17  8:06 pm   how does one think up a question

     so far you're doing great

10.10.17  8:03 pm   Favorite vowel?

     X

10.10.17  7:38 pm   How did you come up with this beautiful channel and ideas :)) 

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

10.10.17  7:33 pm   how do I approach this girl in my calc lecture that I like

     start asking her some math problems

10.10.17  7:28 pm   Why is the average question larger than most of your answers?

     because the questions are being asked by many different people, but all the answers have to be written by the same person. with that perspective, i think it becomes clear that i have done vastly more writing on this page than anyone else has

10.10.17  7:27 pm   do you think there will be a point where you've answered every question and there will be no more questions to answer (over 30,000 questions and counting holy hell)

     i think it reached that point long ago

10.10.17  7:24 pm   r u gonna do another song next?

     yes

10.10.17  7:24 pm   do a vid on how to tell a person u like them. i think it would be cool to c what u come up with

     you can't

10.10.17  7:24 pm   how long did the soap video take to make

     12 days

10.10.17  7:19 pm   When will the universe begin?

     it's been beginning and ending this entire time

10.10.17  7:07 pm   my friend john play the ukulele, does this mean he is possible gay for me? 

     yes, maybe

10.10.17  7:05 pm   How to love?

     try a way that no one has tried before

10.10.17  6:47 pm   Can you teach me how to make music?

     i will try

10.10.17  6:46 pm   do you think that the world has been advancing throughout time or no

     yes

10.10.17  6:45 pm   Great job on the soap video! It seemed like there were one or two callbacks to other videos; was that intentional,

     no

      and if so what made you decide to throw those in there?

     i don't actually know what you mean

10.10.17  6:29 pm   can you submit a question

     sure but i'm not going to

10.10.17  6:29 pm   What inspired you to write "soap tips"?

     i needed a non-song video to come out 2 weeks after my previous song video, and before my next song video

10.10.17  6:26 pm   So, maybe I'm being childish and stupid about this, but... I have a lot of music and artwork that I want to put online (maybe make my own website, but I gotta figure out how to do that)... but I'm kind of torn because, and again maybe I'm being childish, but I'm afraid to share it because I'm afraid of being ridiculed. There's a lot of heavy, deeply personal stuff that comes out in my lyrics and my drawings that I have never expressed or shared with the people I know. And if any of them see it, it would be dropping a huge bombshell on them, changing their perceptions of me. I'm not really afraid of people not liking it, moreso just people thinking 'what the fuck, man'... I have no problems sharing the stuff I make with complete strangers.. but the thought of having friends or family see it is just downright terrifying for me (nobody even knows that I draw or write lyrics/sing... I only share instrumental stuff with friends)... Can you relate?

     oh hell yeah

     Did you ever ha ve any worries or concerns about this type of thing?

     yes, but the answer is simple, just don't tell them about it

10.10.17  6:21 pm   Would you do a song with Eminem

     sure

10.10.17  6:13 pm   Is the pope still the pope

     i will check

10.10.17  6:10 pm   do you enjoy staring at the sun

     no

10.10.17  6:08 pm   Do you have any party tricks

     get lots and lots of work done
